pluginlib
Class OptionWidget

java.lang.Object
  pluginlib.OptionWidget
Direct Known Subclasses:
OptionWidget.BooleanWidget, OptionWidget.ChoiceWidget, OptionWidget.FileWidget, OptionWidget.Label
public abstract class OptionWidget
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a base class for the controls that are used in the property page; each control is connected to an Option object.

Author:
David Cok

Nested Class Summary
static class OptionWidget.BooleanWidget
          This class implements a PropertyWidget for a boolean-valued property, associating it with a check-box Button in the UI.
static class OptionWidget.ChoiceWidget
          A UI widget that offers a selection from a fixed set of strings, corresponding to a ChoiceOption.
static class OptionWidget.FileWidget
          This class implements an OptionWidget for a text field property that holds a file name, using the FileTextField widget, which incorporates a Browse button.
static class OptionWidget.Label
          This class implements an OptionWidget that is a Label, so that it can sit in lists of OptionWidgets.
 
Constructor Summary
OptionWidget(AbstractOption option)
          Base class constructor, taking some common arguments.
 
Method Summary
abstract  void addWidget(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent)
          Creates and adds the widget to the given control
abstract  void setDefault()
          Sets the UI widget to the built-in default value
abstract  void setOptionValue()
          Sets the value of the associated option based on the current UI setting.
